boardgame.name: Pulsar 2849
脈衝星 2849
펄서 2849
boardgame.description: It is the year 2849, and humanity has harnessed the power of the pulsars. Now we must find a way to distribute this power throughout the stars._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In this Euro-style game, players explore space, claim pulsars, and discover technologies that will help them build energy-distribution infrastructure on a cosmic scale. Dice are used to purchase actions, and players choose their dice from a communal pool. There are many paths to victory so you can blaze your own trail to a bright future._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Draft dice to explore the universe in Pulsar 2849. Game is only 8 rounds long._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each round, roll dice based on the number of players, sort them based on their values, then draft dice to take actions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Possible actions_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; □ Fly your survey ship_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; □ take a Gyrodyne_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; □ Develop a Pulsar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; □ Build one or more energy transmitter vectors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; □ Patent a technology_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; □ Buy a dice modifier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; □ Complete a special project in your HQ and unlock Gate Run_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players score points each round based on what they've discovered and explored, and everyone has common goals that they want to achieve._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 116 -- The 2017 Essen Session With Heavy Cardboard
Episode 14 - Santa Maria, Calimala, Clans of Caledonia, Heaven _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Ale, Dinosaur Island and more!
RDTN Episode 137: Castell, Pulsar 2849, and Being Swaggled
TGT 104 On Topic: Euro, Work, and Why Feedback
The Good, the Board, and the Brotherly Love: Episode 143 PAX Unplugged Convention Report with Geof Gambill
The Good, the Board, and the Busy Boy : Episode 142 Mr. Hamm goes to DFW for BGG Con 2017
Vox Republica 157: Five Years Of Cardboard

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
